scMethrix 0.0.0.0001

Principal Component Analysis

Source: R/scMethrix_plot.R
scMethrix_pca.Rd

Principal Component Analysis

scMethrix_pca(
  scm,
  var = "top",
  top_var = 1000,
  ranges = NULL,
  pheno = NULL,
  do_plot = TRUE,
  n_pc = 2
)

Arguments

scm

Input scMethrix object
var

Choose between random CpG sites ('rand') or most variable CpGs ('top').
top_var

Number of variable CpGs to use. Default 1000 Set it to NULL to use all CpGs (which is not recommended due to memory requirements). This option is mutually exclusive with ranges.
ranges

genomic regions to be summarized. Could be a data.table with 3 columns (chr, start, end) or a GenomicRanges object
pheno

Column name of colData(m). Default NULL. Will be used as a factor to color different groups
do_plot

Should a plot be generated?
n_pc

Default 2.

Value

PCA results

Examples

data('scMethrix_data')
scMethrix_pca(scMethrix_data, do_plot = FALSE)

#> $PC_matrix
#>          PC1       PC2        PC3           PC4
#> C1 -94.48552  74.64571   7.905990 -1.844358e-14
#> C2 -71.29470 -87.11091  -4.093163 -3.942680e-14
#> C3  73.96047  16.91890 -45.089912  1.360995e-13
#> C4  91.81975  -4.45370  41.277084 -7.857603e-14
#> 
#> $var_explained
#>  PC1  PC2  PC3  PC4 
#> 0.62 0.30 0.08 0.00 
#>
